posts.post_content:
Looking to trade my Shag Hindu PSA 4 for a 1933 Goudey Ruth PSA 3.
Card looks like it was under graded to me. Looks more like a 5 .
I can send better scans if needed.

John P
Nice freakin card man.  I love it.

Thanks Mailbox,
It is a Sweet Card!

Regards
John P

I'm interested in this card if you end up selling.  I don't have a Ruth for your unfortunately.

[url]noelbrian55@gmail.com[/url]

Hey John great card! Unfortunately I don't have any Goudey's in my collection but do have several T206's and other pre-war cards. If you're open to a possible trade or are willing to sell please PM me. Again great player/reverse/grade combo!
